name: 36 Days of Type - Template
description:
UPDATED FOR #36DAYSOFTYPE 2021


Since I'm going to take part on this year 36 Days of Type using Figma, thought people could use the same baseline.


Here you have the whole layout with:


- Date for each character;

- Week count;

- Pre-prepared exports (correct file size and format);

- Notes on how you should publish;
